result_0:
[PYTHON]
def decimal_to_binary(n):
    return bin(n)[2:]
[/PYTHON]
[TESTS]
# Test case 1:
assert decimal_to_binary(0) == "db0db"
# Test case 2:
assert decimal_to_binary(1) == "db1db"
# Test case 3:
assert decimal_to_binary(2) == "db10db"
# Test case 4:
assert decimal_to_binary(3) == "db11db"
[/TESTS]

result_1:
[PYTHON]
def decimal_to_binary(n):
    return "db" + bin(n)[2:] + "db"
[/PYTHON]
[TESTS]
# Test case 1:
assert decimal_to_binary(0) == "db0db"
# Test case 2:
assert decimal_to_binary(1) == "db1db"
# Test case 3:
assert decimal_to_binary(10) == "db1010db"
[/TESTS]

result_9:
[PYTHON]
def decimal_to_binary(n):
    return "db" + bin(n)[2:].zfill(8) + "db"
[/PYTHON]
[TESTS]
# Test case 1:
assert decimal_to_binary(0) == "db00000000db"
# Test case 2:
assert decimal_to_binary(1) == "db00000001db"
# Test case 3:
assert decimal_to_binary(42) == "db00101010db"
[/TESTS]
